input.label: Show only systems that should update

table.searchTemplate: | tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as _time,latest(Updates.status) as status,latest(Updates.dest_should_update) as dest_should_update from datamodel=Updates where * $dest_should_update$ $dm_signature$ $dest$ by Updates.dest,Updates.signature_id,Updates.vendor_product | `drop_dm_object_name("Updates")` | `get_update_signature` | search $status$ $signature$ | sort - _time,dest,signature | fields _time,status,signature_id,signature,dest,dest_should_update

drilldown.link: search?q=| `datamodel("Updates", "Updates")` | search Updates.dest_should_update="$row.dest_should_update$" Updates.status="$row.status$" Updates.signature_id="$row.signature_id$" Updates.signature="$row.signature$" Updates.dest="$row.dest$" | `drop_dm_object_name("Updates")`&earliest=$earliest$&latest=$latest$
